name: Hoaka Naivalu
story: Hoaka joined the French military at a young age, eager to make a difference in his home country of Saint Lucia. He quickly rose through the ranks and earned a position as a guard, where his sharp instincts and steady aim caught the attention of the Independent faction in Arma 3. Now he serves as a skilled machine gunner, protecting his fellow soldiers and fighting for what he believes is right.
